movies.title: Primorskiy bulvar
movies.plot: The events of the movie take place in the city of Odessa. A guy named Sasha sees a beautiful girl on the street and, following her, inadvertently causes a car crash. The driver of the car turns out to be none other than this girl's father, who is also a screenplay writer currently experiencing a writer's block. Instead of demanding money from Sasha for repairs to his vehicle, the writer makes Sasha tell him all the details of his new relationship with the girl he saw on the street, not knowing that this girl (Lena) is his own daughter. To make things more complex, Lena has a younger sister Dasha who begins to like Sasha.
movies.simplePlot: The events of the movie take place in the city of Odessa. A guy named Sasha sees a beautiful girl on the street and, following her, inadvertently causes a car crash. The driver of the car ...

biography.bio: Valentina Talyzina was born on January 22, 1935 in Omsk, Russian SFSR, USSR as Valentina Illarionovna Talyzina. She is an actress, known for Three from Prostokvashino (1978), Vacation in Prostokvashino (1980) and Winter in Prostokvashino (1984).
biography.name: Valentina Talyzina

biography.bio: Aleksandr Buyanov is an actor, known for Taxi Blues (1990), Bastards (2006) and Primorskiy bulvar (1988).
biography.name: Aleksandr Buyanov

biography.bio: Oleg Fedulov was born on June 30, 1947. He is known for his work on V poiskakh kapitana Granta (1986), Poyezd vne raspisaniya (1986) and Trest, kotoryy lopnul (1983).
biography.name: Oleg Fedulov

biography.bio: Oksana Fomichyova was born on August 17, 1968 in Moscow, USSR. She is an actress, known for The Bay of Death (1991), Rozhdyonnye svyshe (1994) and Iskhod (1990).
biography.name: Oksana Fomichyova

biography.bio: Andrey Gradov was born on January 29, 1954 in Moscow, RSFSR, USSR as Andrey Petrovitch Gradov. He is an actor, known for Beregite zhenshchin! (1981), Golubye molnii (1978) and Teplo studyonoy zemli (1984).
biography.name: Andrey Gradov

biography.bio: Valentina Gubskaya is an actress, known for Atlantida (2002), Po ulitsam komod vodili... (1978) and Priklyucheniya Elektronika (1980).
biography.name: Valentina Gubskaya

biography.bio: Olga Kabo was born on January 28, 1968 as Olga Igorevna Kabo. She is an actress, known for Umirat ne strashno (1991), The Ice Runner (1992) and Priklyucheniya Kventina Dorvarda, strelka korolevskoy gvardii (1988). She has been married to Nikolai Razgulyayev since March 2009. They have one child. She was previously married to Eduard Vasilishen.
biography.name: Olga Kabo

biography.placeOfBirth: Petrovka, Primorskiy kray, RSFSR, USSR [now Russia]
biography.bio: Aleksandr Kuznetsov was born on December 2, 1959 in Petrovka, Primorskiy kray, RSFSR, USSR as Aleksandr Konstantinovich Kuznetsov. He is an actor and writer, known for Space Cowboys (2000), Agent destructeur (2000) and Revenge (2005).
biography.name: Aleksandr Kuznetsov

biography.bio: Valentina Legkostupova is an actress, known for Primorskiy bulvar (1988).
biography.name: Valentina Legkostupova

biography.bio: Anna Nazareva was born on June 24, 1969 in Moscow, RSFSR, USSR as Anna Vladimirovna Nazareva. She is an actress, known for Vozmi menya s soboy (1990), Greshnaya lyubov (1997) and Igra na milliony (1991). She has been married to Aleksandr Polynnikov since 1987.
biography.name: Anna Nazareva

biography.bio: Anatoliy Ravikovich was born on December 24, 1936 in Leningrad, USSR as Anatoli Yuryevich Ravikovich. He was an actor and director, known for Zagadka Endkhauza (1990), Pokrov Gates (1983) and Chelovek i dzhentlmen (1973). He was married to Irina Mazurkevich. He died on April 8, 2012 in St. Petersburg, Russia.
biography.name: Anatoliy Ravikovich

actors.character: a scenarist, Lena's and Dasha's father

biography.bio: Marina Shimanskaya was born on October 27, 1955 in Saratov, RSFSR, USSR as Marina Mechislavovna Shimanskaya. She is an actress, known for Beregite zhenshchin! (1981), Eskadron gusar letuchikh (1982) and Kogda ya stanu velikanom (1979).
biography.name: Marina Shimanskaya

biography.bio: Olga Zarubina was born on August 29, 1958 in Moscow, Russian SFSR, USSR as Olga Vladimirovna Zarubina. She is an actress, known for Night Watch (2004), Bezumnaya Lori (1991) and Primorskiy bulvar (1988). She has been married to Andrei Salov since January 22, 2010. She was previously married to Vladimir Evdokimov and Aleksandr Malinin.
biography.name: Olga Zarubina
